text.0: There are some great resources out there to help journalists expand their source networks, particularly in the face of tight deadlines. Thanks @RJI for this round-up. https://t.co/pPB07uBjVH
text.1:
We talk a lot about source diversity. But having *time* to develop new and diverse sources can be challenging.

We want to recognize news leaders who see this as a priority.

Journalists, please tag an editor who’s intentionally given you time to do meaningful source development.
